1.title: Quick Start: LBCO from CIF
1.description: Minimalistic Rietveld refinement of La0.5Ba0.5CoO3 using sample model and experiment defined via CIF files

2.title: Quick Start: LBCO from Code
2.description: Minimalistic Rietveld refinement of La0.5Ba0.5CoO3 with sample model and experiment defined directly in code

3.title: Basic Tutorial: LBCO, HRPT
3.description: Comprehensive Rietveld refinement of La0.5Ba0.5CoO3 following GUI-like workflow with detailed explanations

4.title: Advanced: PbSO4 Joint NPD+XRD Fit
4.description: Advanced Rietveld refinement of PbSO4 using joint fit of neutron and X-ray diffraction data

5.title: Crystal Structure: Co2SiO4, D20
5.description: Rietveld refinement of Co2SiO4 crystal structure using constant wavelength neutron powder diffraction data from D20 at ILL

6.title: Crystal Structure: HS, HRPT
6.description: Rietveld refinement of HS crystal structure using constant wavelength neutron powder diffraction data from HRPT at PSI

7.title: Crystal Structure: Si, SEPD (TOF)
7.description: Rietveld refinement of Si crystal structure using time-of-flight neutron powder diffraction data from SEPD at Argonne

8.title: Crystal Structure: NCAF, WISH (Multi-Data)
8.description: Rietveld refinement of Na2Ca3Al2F14 using time-of-flight neutron data from WISH at ISIS with joint fitting of two detector banks

9.title: Crystal Structure: LBCO+Si Multi-Phase (McStas)
9.description: Rietveld refinement of La0.5Ba0.5CoO3 with Si impurity phase using time-of-flight neutron data simulated with McStas

10.title: PDF Analysis: Ni, NPD
10.description: Pair distribution function (PDF) analysis of Ni using constant wavelength neutron powder diffraction data

11.title: PDF Analysis: Si, NOMAD (TOF)
11.description: Pair distribution function (PDF) analysis of Si using time-of-flight neutron powder diffraction data from NOMAD at SNS

12.title: PDF Analysis: NaCl, XRD
12.description: Pair distribution function (PDF) analysis of NaCl using X-ray powder diffraction data

13.title: DMSC Summer School 2025: Powder Diffraction Analysis
13.description: Comprehensive workshop tutorial covering Rietveld refinement of Si and La0.5Ba0.5CoO3 using simulated powder diffraction data
